QuestData.Title: The Kun-Lai Kicker
QuestData.Description: Have you ever seen the Brewmoon Festival?$b$bThe good folks of Binan Village host quite a party. And tonight's festivities are brew-catered by none other than yours truly here.$b$bI am making my famous Kun-Lai Kicker!$b$bThink you might come and join us for the festivities? It should be a completely relaxing event with absolutely no danger whatsoever.
